text: "Tattoo" is a song by Swedish singer Loreen, released on 25 February 2023. After winning Melodifestivalen with the song, Loreen went on to represent Sweden in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023, and won the competition for a second time. "Tattoo" was written by Loreen along with Jimmy "Joker" Thörnfeldt, Jimmy Jansson, Moa Carlebecker, Peter Boström and Thomas G:son. "Tattoo" has broken several records, including being the first Eurovision song in over 27 years to stay in the top five of the UK Singles Chart for two weeks. It has also become the fourth most streamed Eurovision song on Spotify. == Sources == Category:2023 songs Category:Europop songs Category:Eurovision Song Contest winning songs
title: Tattoo (Loreen song)
